definitions: the supply of water to land or crops to help growth, typically by means of channels

examples.text: the river supplies water for irrigation of agricultural crops

shortDefinitions: supply of water to land or crops to help growth

definitions: the process of washing out an organ or wound with a continuous flow of water or medication

examples.text: for sinus congestion, saline nasal irrigation can be helpful

shortDefinitions: process of washing out organ or wound with continuous flow of water or medication
